plays.text: Goal scored by Rod Brind'Amour assisted by Erik Cole and Bates Battaglia
Penalty to Jeff O'Neill 2 minutes for High Sticking Marty McInnis
Penalty to Ron Francis 2 minutes for Holding Sean Brown
Goal scored by Sergei Samsonov assisted by Glen Murray and Jozef Stumpel
Penalty to Darren Langdon 2 minutes for Roughing Dennis Bonvie
Penalty to Sean Brown 2 minutes for Holding Sami Kapanen
Goal scored by Brian Rolston unassisted
Penalty to Glen Murray 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Ron Francis
Goal scored by Glen Murray assisted by P.J. Stock
Penalty to Byron Dafoe 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by P.J. Axelsson
Penalty to Kyle McLaren 2 minutes for Hooking Bates Battaglia
Goal scored by Rod Brind'Amour assisted by Sean Hill and Sami Kapanen
